productinfo.name: MATLAB Report Generator
productinfo.list:
Report File List rptlist $toolbox/rptgen/resources/Report.png
Report Explorer setedit $toolbox/rptgen/resources/ReportGenerator.png
Source File Converter rptconvert $toolbox/rptgen/resources/Convert.png
Component Creator compwiz $toolbox/rptgen/resources/Component_unparentable.png
-->
ヘルプ doc rptgen/ $toolbox/matlab/icons/book_mat.gif
デモ demo('Matlab','Matlab Report Generator') $toolbox/matlab/icons/demoicon.gif
製品ページ (Web) web http://www.mathworks.com/products/ML_reportgenerator/ -browser; $toolbox/matlab/icons/webicon.gif
